writings.text: 盆と正月が一緒に来たよう
盆と正月が一緒に来た様

readings.text: ぼんとしょうがつがいっしょにきたよう

furigana.writing: 盆と正月が一緒に来たよう
furigana.reading: ぼんとしょうがつがいっしょにきたよう

furigana.writing: 盆と正月が一緒に来た様
furigana.reading: ぼんとしょうがつがいっしょにきたよう

glossary: as if Christmas and one's birthday had come at the same time
as if Lady Luck had just visited twice
as if the Bon Festival and New Year had come at the same time
as if the two busiest days of the year had come at the same time
